parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns ETA to the target in seconds for given artillery unit based on target position and used magazine, -1 if target can't be hit.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''getArtilleryETA''' [targetPosition, magazineType]  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - artillery unit </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> targetPosition: [[Position]] - position of the target </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineType: [[String]] - type of magazine used</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mortar [[getArtilleryETA]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] _target, [[getArtilleryAmmo]] [_mortar] [[select]] 0];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mortar [[getArtilleryETA]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] _target, [[currentMagazine]] _mortar];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getArtilleryAmmo]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[enableEngineArtillery]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[inRangeOfArtillery]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>

<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]
<dd class="note">To avoid wrong ETA readings, position of the target should only be obtained via [[position]] or [[getPos]]
